scripts.prepublish: eslint ./src/ && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.build: babel src/ -d dist/ --source-maps && cp package.json dist/
scripts.test: npm run build && (NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover -x 'dist/spec/*.spec.js' jasmine -- dist/spec/*.spec.js && [ -z ${COVERALLS_REPO_TOKEN} ] || cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ../node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js)
scripts.dev-test: npm run build && NODE_ENV=test jasmine dist/spec/*.spec.js
scripts.coverage: npm run build && (NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover -x 'dist/spec/*.spec.js' jasmine -- dist/spec/*.spec.js && open ./coverage/lcov-report/index.html)
